channel.title: Streaming on Peter's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Streaming on Peter's Notebook

item.title: Streaming / 2023-07-20
item.description: Soundtrack new Twitch.Player("twitch-embed", { video: "1877130621" }); I’m making an effort (for some values of “effort”) to line up my “evening painting” with 2000 UK Time and a camera. I’m doing the Twitch Streaming thing - I guess. I had wanted to do Balthasar Gold across all the models … but … speed said “No” which was surprising. One of the ex Games Workshop product designers (who was bald) mentioned pulling his hair out whenever they did user testing and everybody grabbed the smallest brush they sold and then wondered why it took them forever to finish their models.
